titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: WOMEN RECALL CEASED TOTAL (UPPER TIER LOCAL AUTHORITY) - Description

body.p: WOMEN RECALL CEASED TOTAL (UPPER TIER LOCAL AUTHORITY) is the total number of resident women ineligible for the NHS Breast Screening Programme in the Upper Tier Local Authority .

WOMEN RECALL CEASED TOTAL (UPPER TIER LOCAL AUTHORITY) are those women with a BREAST SCREENING CALL STATUS recorded as National Code ' Recall ceased - Bilateral Mastectomy' or ' Recall ceased - Patient choice'.
